definition: To captivate or inspire someone with enthusiasm, typically used to describe the effect of something on a person.

examples.german: Ich bin von dem Film begeistert.
examples.english: I am enthusiastic about the movie.

examples.german: Die Zuschauer waren von der Vorstellung begeistert.
examples.english: The audience was thrilled by the performance.

examples.german: Er konnte die Jury mit seinem Talent begeistern.
examples.english: He was able to impress the jury with his talent.

examples.german: Die neue Technologie hat mich sofort begeistert.
examples.english: I was immediately fascinated by the new technology.

examples.german: Sie konnte die Kinder mit ihrer Geschichte begeistern.
examples.english: She was able to captivate the children with her story.
